titles.title: To require congressional approval of major Executive Orders and major rules, and for other purposes.
To require congressional approval of major Executive Orders and major rules, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Rules, the Budget, and Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
